import React from'react';import{AppBar,Toolbar,Box,List,ListItem,Typography,styled,ListItemButton,ListItemText}from'@mui/material';// menu
import DrawerItem from'./DrawerItem';// rotas
import{Link}from'react-router-dom';// personalizacao
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StyledToolbar=styled(Toolbar)({display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between'});const ListMenu=styled(List)(_ref=>{let{theme}=_ref;return{display:'none',[theme.breakpoints.up("sm")]:{display:"flex"}};});//rotas
const itemList=[{text:"Home",to:"/"},{text:"About",to:"/about"},{text:"Contact",to:"/contact"}];const Navbar=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{component:"nav",position:"sticky",sx:{backgroundColor:'black'},elevation:0,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(StyledToolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",component:"h2",children:"HBSales"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:{xs:'block',sm:'none'}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DrawerItem,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListMenu,{children:itemList.map(item=>{const{text}=item;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemButton,{component:Link,to:item.to,sx:{color:'#fff',"&:hover":{backgroundColor:'transparent',color:'#1e2a5a'}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:text})})},text);})})]})});};export default Navbar;
